name: Fap Queen 2
description:
• Meet anime mistresses!
  • Follow their commands (in real life)!
  • That includes touching yourself. A lot. Have fun!

Fap Queen 2 is a JOI game, where cute anime mistresses command you to play with yourself in various kinky ways. Endure their challenges and torments long enough, and the Queen might reward you in the end *wink wink*.

Obviously the game cannot check whether you actually do the tasks, but why would anyone cheat in a wonderful game like this?

A friendly tip: set your Steam account to private before downloading, or otherwise all your friends will see what a pervert you are :P
